original: Majjhima Nikāya 118
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Ānāpānassatisutta
analyzed: āna apāna ssati sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ—
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhi

original: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā
analyzed: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā

original: ca mahākaccāyanena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena āyasmatā ca mahākappinena āyasmatā
analyzed: ca mahākaccāyanena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena āyasmatā ca mahākappinena āyasmatā

original: ca mahācundena āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena,
analyzed: ca mahācundena āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena

original: aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ.
analyzed: aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhi

original: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena therāḥ bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti

original: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū
analyzed: appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū dasa api bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū

original: vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti
analyzed: vīsam pi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū tisam pi bhikkhū ovadanti

original: anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
analyzed: anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū cattārīsam pi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti

original: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
analyzed: te ca navāḥ bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānāḥ anusāsiyamānāḥ uḷāram pubbena aparam visesam jānanti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ abbhokāse nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtam tuṇhībhūtam bhikkhu saṅgham anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “āraddhosmi, bhikkhave, imāya paṭipadāya;
analyzed: āraddhaḥ asmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya

original: āraddhacittosmi, bhikkhave, imāya paṭipadāya.
analyzed: āraddha cittaḥ asmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, bhiyyoso mattāya vīriyaṁ ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā, anadhigatassa adhigamāya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave bhiyyosaḥ mattāya vīriyam ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya a sacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya

original: Idhevāhaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ komudiṁ cātumāsiniṁ āgamessāmī”ti.
analyzed: idha iva aham sāvatthiyam komudim cātumāsinim āgamessāmi iti

original: Assosuṁ kho jānapadā bhikkhū:
analyzed: assosum kho jānapadāḥ bhikkhū

original: “bhagavā kira tattheva sāvatthiyaṁ komudiṁ cātumāsiniṁ āgamessatī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā kira tattha iva sāvatthiyam komudim cātumāsinim āgamessati iti

original: Te jānapadā bhikkhū sāvatthiṁ osaranti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: te jānapadāḥ bhikkhū sāvatthim osaranti bhagavantam dassanāya

original: Te ca kho therā bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
analyzed: te ca kho therāḥ bhikkhū bhiyyosaḥ mattāya nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti

original: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū
analyzed: appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū dasa api bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū

original: vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti
analyzed: vīsam pi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū tisam pi bhikkhū ovadanti

original: anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
analyzed: anusāsanti appekacce therāḥ bhikkhū cattārīsam pi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti

original: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
analyzed: te ca navāḥ bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānāḥ anusāsiyamānāḥ uḷāram pubbena aparam visesam jānanti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyā cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tad ahuposathe pannarase komudiyā cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ abbhokāse nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtam tuṇhībhūtam bhikkhu saṅgham anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “Apalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; nippalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā.
analyzed: apalāpāya bhikkhave parisā nippalāpāya bhikkhave parisā suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā

original: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
analyzed: tathārūpaḥ aya bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghaḥ tathārūpā aya bhikkhave parisā

original: yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
analyzed: yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjali karaṇīyā anuttaram puñña kkhettam lokassa

original: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
analyzed: tathārūpaḥ aya bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghaḥ tathārūpā aya bhikkhave parisā

original: yathārūpāya parisāya appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ.
analyzed: yathārūpāya parisāya appam dinnam bahu hoti bahu dinnam bahutara

original: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
analyzed: tathārūpaḥ aya bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghaḥ tathārūpā aya bhikkhave parisā

original: yathārūpā parisā dullabhā dassanāya lokassa.
analyzed: yathārūpā parisā dullabhā dassanāya lokassa

original: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
analyzed: tathārūpaḥ aya bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghaḥ tathārūpā aya bhikkhave parisā

original: yathārūpaṁ parisaṁ alaṁ yojanagaṇanāni dassanāya gantuṁ puṭosenāpi.
analyzed: yathārūpam parisam alam yojana gaṇanāni dassanāya gantum puṭosena api

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā—
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ vusitavantaḥ kata karaṇīyāḥ ohita bhārāḥ an uppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā sammadaññā vimuttā

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā—
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinaḥ an āvatti dhammā tasmā lokā

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissanti—
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayāḥ rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imam lokam āgantvā dukkhassantam karissanti

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā—
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannāḥ a vinipāta dhammāḥ niyatāḥ sambodhi parāyanā

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti—
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …pe…
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe catunnam sammappadhānānam bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti pe

original: catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ …
analyzed: catunnam iddhipādānam

original: pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ …
analyzed: pañca annam indriyānam

original: pañcannaṁ balānaṁ …
analyzed: pañca annam balānam

original: sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ …
analyzed: bojjhaṅgānam

original: ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti—
analyzed: ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe mettābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe mettā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: karuṇābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
analyzed: karuṇā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: muditābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
analyzed: muditā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: upekkhābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
analyzed: upekkhā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: asubhabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
analyzed: asubha bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: aniccasaññābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti—
analyzed: anicca saññā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
analyzed: evarūpāḥ api bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe

original: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe ānāpānassatibhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmin bhikkhu saṅghe āna apāna ssati bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti

original: Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
analyzed: āna apāna sati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisasā

original: Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti.
analyzed: āna apāna sati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti

original: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
analyzed: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti

original: Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti.
analyzed: satta bojjhaṅgāḥ bhāvitāḥ bahulīkatāḥ vijjā vimuttim paripūrenti

original: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā?
analyzed: katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave āna apāna sati katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisasā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So satova assasati satova passasati.
analyzed: saḥ satas iva assasati satas iva passasati

original: Dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, dīghaṁ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: dīgham vai assasantaḥ dīgham assasāmi iti pajānāti dīgham vā passasantaḥ dīgham passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: rassaṁ vā assasanto ‘rassaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, rassaṁ vā passasanto ‘rassaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: rassam vai assasantaḥ rassam assasāmi iti pajānāti rassam vā passasantaḥ rassam passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: sabba kāya paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati sabba kāya paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
analyzed: passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram assasissāmi iti sikkhati passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘Pītipaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘pītipaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: pīti paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati pīti paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘sukhapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘sukhapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: sukha paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati sukha paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: citta saṅkhāra paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati citta saṅkhāra paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘passambhayaṁ cittasaṅkhāraṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṁ cittasaṅkhāraṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
analyzed: passambhayam citta saṅkhāram assasissāmi iti sikkhati passambhayam citta saṅkhāram passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘Cittapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘cittapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: citta paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati citta paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: abhippamā udayam cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati abhippamā udayam cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: samādaham cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati samādaham cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
analyzed: vimocayam cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati vimocayam cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘Aniccānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘aniccānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: anicca anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati anicca anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘virāgānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘virāgānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: virāga anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati virāga anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘nirodhānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘nirodhānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: nirodha anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati nirodha anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘paṭinissaggānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
analyzed: paṭinissagga anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati paṭinissagga anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
analyzed: evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave āna apāna sati evam bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisasā

original: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti?
analyzed: katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave āna apāna sati katham bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, dīghaṁ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu dīgham vā assasantaḥ dīgham assasāmi iti pajānāti dīgham vā passasantaḥ dīgham passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: rassaṁ vā assasanto ‘rassaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, rassaṁ vā passasanto ‘rassaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: rassam vai assasantaḥ rassam assasāmi iti pajānāti rassam vā passasantaḥ rassam passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: sabba kāya paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati sabba kāya paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram assasissāmi iti sikkhati passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: kāye kāyānupassī, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: kāye kāya anupassī bhikkhave tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Kāyesu kāyaññatarāhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ—assāsapassāsā.
analyzed: kāyesu kāyaññatara āha bhikkhave evam vadāmi yat idam assāsa passāsā

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, kāye kāyānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave kāye kāya anupassī tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘pītipaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘pītipaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu pīti paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati pīti paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘sukhapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘sukhapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: sukha paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati sukha paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: citta saṅkhāra paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati citta saṅkhāra paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘passambhayaṁ cittasaṅkhāraṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṁ cittasaṅkhāraṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: passambhayam citta saṅkhāram assasissāmi iti sikkhati passambhayam citta saṅkhāram passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: vedanāsu vedanānupassī, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: vedanāsu vedanā anupassī bhikkhave tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Vedanāsu vedanāññatarāhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ—assāsapassāsānaṁ sādhukaṁ manasikāraṁ.
analyzed: vedanāsu vedanā aññatarā āha bhikkhave evam vadāmi yat idam assāsa passāsānam sādhukam manasikāra

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave vedanāsu vedanā anupassī tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘cittapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘cittapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu citta paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati citta paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: abhippamā udayam cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati abhippamā udayam cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: samādaham cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati samādaham cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: vimocayam cittam assasissāmi iti sikkhati vimocayam cittam passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: citte cittānupassī, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: citte citta anupassī bhikkhave tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatiṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave muṭṭha ssatissa asampajānassa āna apāna ssatim vadāmi

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, citte cittānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave citte citta anupassī tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘aniccānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘aniccānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu anicca anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati anicca anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘virāgānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘virāgānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: virāga anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati virāga anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘nirodhānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘nirodhānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: nirodha anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati nirodha anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘paṭinissaggānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: paṭinissagga anupassī assasissāmi iti sikkhati paṭinissagga anupassī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī bhikkhave tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: So yaṁ taṁ abhijjhādomanassānaṁ pahānaṁ taṁ paññāya disvā sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
analyzed: so yam tam abhijjhā domanassānam pahānam tam paññāya disvā sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, dhammesu dhammānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave dhammesu dhamma anupassī tasmin samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti.
analyzed: evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave āna apāna sati evam bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti

original: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti?
analyzed: katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā katham bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ, upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassaḥ upaṭṭhitā assa tasmin samaye satī hoti asammuṭṭhā

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti asammuṭṭhā, satisambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti a sammuṭṭhā sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti. Satisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti sati sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti

original: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: so tathā asataḥ viharantaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmasam āpajjati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā asataḥ viharantaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati

original: pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno
analyzed: āpajjati dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ

original: āraddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: āraddhaḥ hoti dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
analyzed: tassa tam dhammam paññāya pavicinataḥ pavicayataḥ parivīmasam āpajjataḥ āraddham hoti vīriyam a sallīna

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinataḥ pavicayataḥ parivīmasa

original: āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno
analyzed: āpajjataḥ āraddham hoti vīriyam tasmin samaye bhikkhuno

original: āraddho hoti, vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: āraddhaḥ hoti vīriya sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti vīriya sambojjhaṅgo

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Āraddhavīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā.
analyzed: āraddha vīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno āraddhavīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā, pītisambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddha vīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, pītisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti pīti sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti

original: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati.
analyzed: pīti manassa kāyaḥ api passambhati cittam api passambhati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno pīti manassa kāyaḥ api passambhati cittam api passambhati

original: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṁ
analyzed: passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhuno āraddhaḥ hoti passaddhi sambojjhaṅga

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
analyzed: passaddha kāyassa sukhino cittam samādhiyati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ passaddha kāyassa sukhino cittam samādhiyati

original: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, samādhisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ
analyzed: samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti samādhi sambojjhaṅgam tasmin

original: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti samādhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
analyzed: saḥ tathā samāhitam cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā samāhitam cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam tasmin

original: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanāsu …pe…
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu vedanāsu pe

original: citte …
analyzed: citte

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ, upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassaḥ upaṭṭhitā assa tasmin samaye satī hoti asammuṭṭhā

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti asammuṭṭhā, satisambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno upaṭṭhitā sati hoti a sammuṭṭhā sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, satisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti sati sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti

original: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: so tathā asataḥ viharantaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmasam āpajjati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā asataḥ viharantaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinati

original: pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno
analyzed: āpajjati dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ

analyzed: āraddhaḥ hoti dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
analyzed: tassa tam dhammam paññāya pavicinataḥ pavicayataḥ parivīmasam āpajjataḥ āraddham hoti vīriyam a sallīna

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ tam dhammam paññāya pavicinataḥ pavicayataḥ parivīmasa

analyzed: āpajjataḥ āraddham hoti vīriyam tasmin samaye bhikkhuno

original: āraddho hoti, vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo
analyzed: āraddhaḥ hoti vīriya sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti vīriya sambojjhaṅgo

analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

analyzed: āraddha vīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā

analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno āraddha vīriyassa uppajjati pīti nirāmisā pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ

analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti pīti sambojjhaṅgam tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti

analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

analyzed: pīti manassa kāyaḥ api passambhati cittam api passambhati

analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno pīti manassa kāyaḥ api passambhati cittam api passambhati

original: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṁ
analyzed: passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhuno āraddhaḥ hoti passaddhi sambojjhaṅga

original: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tasmin samaye bhikkhu bhāveti passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
analyzed: passaddha kāyassa sukhino cittam samādhiyati

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ passaddha kāyassa sukhino cittam samādhiyati

original: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, samādhisambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ
analyzed: samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti samādhi sambojjhaṅgam tasmin

original: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti samādhi sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
analyzed: saḥ tathā samāhitam cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: Yasmiṁ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhikkhave bhikkhu tathā samāhitam cittam sādhukam ajjhupekkhitā hoti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ tasmiṁ
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ āraddhaḥ hoti upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam tasmin

original: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: samaye bhikkhu bhāveti upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo tasmin samaye bhikkhunaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṁ bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
analyzed: evam bhāvitā kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evam bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti

original: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti?
analyzed: katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā katham bahulīkatāḥ vijjā vimuttim paripūrenti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sati sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
analyzed: dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti pe

original: vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: vīriya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: pītisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: passaddhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: samādhisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …
analyzed: samādhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāva iti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti.
analyzed: evam bhāvitāḥ kho bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgāḥ evam bahulīkatāḥ vijjā vimuttim paripūrenti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Ānāpānassatisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: āna apāna ssati suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
